column1: obituary for: lorraine s. dart | blaney funeral home & cremation services| lorraine s. dart
column7: at her home surrounded by her family. she was born on november 14
column9: in green bay to august and irene (capelle) tuyls. lorraine graduated from green bay west high school
column10: class of 1941. she was a lifetime member of annunciation parish. lorraine was very devoted to raising her family and took great pride in their accomplishments in life. she loved the family sunday dinners and spending time with her family especially around the holidays. lorraine had a fondness for animals and had a special place in her heart for her cat
column11: mitzi. she is survived by eight children and their spouses
column20: larry phillips; 18 grandchildren; five great-grandchildren; two sisters and a brother-in-law
column23: nephews and other relatives and friends. lorraine was preceded in death by her parents; a daughter
column25: gale ness. friends may call at blaney funeral home
column27: from 4 to 7 p. m. monday. a parish wake will take place at 7 p. m. monday. the mass of resurrection will be held at 11 a. m. tuesday at annunciation catholic church
column28: 401 gray st. with rev. donald everts officiating. burial will be in fort howard memorial park. to send online condolences
column29: please go to www. blaney. funeralhome. com.
